description:
1. The Mountain of Judgement! (written by Jack Kirby : reprinted in: Jimmy Olsen: Adventures by Jack Kirby (2003), Jack Kirby's Fourth World Omnibus #1)

    Jimmy, the Newsboy Legion and The Outsiders are on their way to the Mountain of Judgment... unless a certain Blue Boy Scout has any say in the matter!

  2. The Whiz Wagons Are Coming! (written by Jack Kirby : reprinted in: Jimmy Olsen: Adventures by Jack Kirby (2003))

Text article about the Whiz Wagons, also includes a Kirby self portrait.
name: The Mountain of Judgement

description:
As the mysterious crimelord El Morte consolidates his hold on Central City's gangs, Ellen travels to Venezuela to find the truth about the cadaverous gangster. Can Ellen and the Spirit find the key to defeating this unstoppable foe?

The astronauts on the space shuttle make their way across the moon's surface and enter the Watchtower and confront the League, revealing that they are being controlled by the Bloodlines parasites which in turn have granted them super powers.Against Batman's wishes, Monaghan begins shooting them so that he and the League can escape; during their rush to the elevator, one of the parasites attaches itself to Batman.Based beneath Aquaman's tank, the League take stock of their options with Wonder Woman determining the parasite's plans to conquer the Earth. She reasons that as warriors, she and Monaghan should attempt to regain control of the Watchtower's communications and summon help from Earth's superheroes but on the way she is attacked by the parasite's. As Monaghan reaches the communications level, he is greeted by Superman who has been taken over by one of the parasites.On Earth, the president of the US reluctantly agrees to launching nuclear missiles at the Watchtower following reports that the League may have been infected.On the Watchtower, Monaghan helps Superman overcome the parasite which renders him almost powerless, leaving Monaghan to face the remaining parasites. He shoots them and convinces the parasites to leave. The Leaguers regain their pwers and manage to have the nuclear missiles recalled.With the League restored, Batman hauls Monaghan back to Gotham and hands him over to the police, who in turn let him go.
name: On the Darkside Part Two

description:
Overview

Dynamite's Battlestar Galactica Season Zero continues from writer Brandon (ZAREK) Jerwa and artist Jackson Herbert!

This brand-new series features the very first missions of the Battlestar Galactica and her crew, including Commander Adama, Starbuck, Apollo, and more. In these early days of the Galactica under Adama's command, a mystery is unfolding across the Galaxy that has deadly implications for the human race!

Featuring four stunning covers - Stjepan (Darkness, Savage Tales) Sejic, Adriano (JUNGLE GIRL and Red Sonja) Batista, Stephen Segovia and a Battlestar Galactica Photo Cover!

Magnus and the Robot Renegades form an uneasy alliance to save Gold and the Metal Men as they come face to face with Doctor Tomorrow and his deadly Death-Metal Men! Plus, the time-war between the ancient alchemist known only as the Nameless and the twisted future shock versions of himself rages on! Who will be the victor? And more importantly, will the Metal Men ever be created?

Chapter Seven: Arrows From The Sun

Chapter Eight: Golden Child
name: Chapter Seven: Arrows From The Sun; Chapter Eight: Golden Child

description: Tommy Zhou, The Weapon, has to rescue his partner Megan, before the forest demons Lin Kui, find the secrets of the sacred scroll of Bohidharma and kill her off. But, does Tommy know everything about his new partner, or is she hiding a secret that could be more dangerous than the traps in the Shan-Tao temple?

Avast! Ben faces a nautical nuisance! Plus, Codename: Kids Next Door and Samurai Jack!

  • Ben 10 in Swimming With Sharks
  • Codename: Kids Next Door in Operation: Knights
  • Samurai Jack in Please Don't Feed the Monsters
name: Swimming With Sharks; Operation: Knights; Please Don't Feed the Monsters

description: Finally, the origin of Robin can be told! Plus, witness a day in the lives of Starfire and Raven. Which one of them will stop Gizmo's latest crime spree?
name: Regarding Robin/One Morning

description: 'Invisible Children Part 3 (of 3)': Torn from today's headlines, the electrifying conclusion to The Phantom's one-man war against the army of HIM is now! Don't miss out as our hero comes face-to-face with his worst nightmare. Can he overcome HIM, or will The Phantom become his next recruit? Moonstone Books teams with YOU to make a difference in this tragic, continuing real world atrocity. In order to do this, Moonstone has enlisted legendary artists to create limited edition B covers for each issue of this story arc. For each limited edition issue of Phantoms #17-19, Moonstone Books will make a contribution to in order to create safe havens with food, healthcare and educations for the children affected by this war.
name: Invisible Children, Part Three of Three

description: The mysteries of Ivy Town deepen as it appears Ray Palmer may have been more responsible for the bad than the good…and the new Atom is further disillusioned by his former mentor. Featuring guest writer Roger Stern (THE DEATH OF SUPERMAN)!
name: Forward! Into The Past!

description:
Overview

A plague of the undead has overtaken the town of Tranquility! Heroes and villains alike fight for their lives while the zombie masses keep coming. Is there anyone living — or dead — that can save the day?
name: A Fire To Believe In

description: Los Angeles Times-best selling author Gregg Hurwitz (The Crime Writer) and Marcelo Frusin (Hellblazer) bring you a gritty, self-contained story! It’s Wolverine as you’ve never seen him before! A botched bank heist. A dozen dead civilians. A man on the run. Smitty’s a two-bit hoodlum with blood on his hands and a monster nipping at his heels. A relentless force of nature whose senses are as sharp as his claws. Smitty is going to die, and he knows it. The only question is: when? To understand the ending, you must start at the beginning. And Smitty’s story is a killer.
name: The Death Song of J. Patrick Smitty

description: Think you know everything there is to know about the things that go bump in the night? Think again! Discover the events that led to the infectious Marvel Zombies. What does Belasco have in store for the X-Men? What is lurking in the unknown? Is it the Lurking Unknown or something worse? Think Set and Seth are one and the same? What is the most powerful black magic tome on Earth? What are the Azazel, Brain, Lord of Death and Voyager? Find out all of this and more as we explore the dark depths of the Marvel Universe and beyond featuring Demons (a massive eight-page profile), Angels, Werewolves, Vampires, death gods Damballah and Pluto, and much more! Oh yeah, and did we mention Marvel Zombies?

concept_credits.name: Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe

first_appearance_concepts.name: Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe

first_appearance_teams.name: Demons of the Realm of Madness

team_credits.name: Demons of the Realm of Madness

volume.name: Marvel Zombies: The Book of Angels, Demons & Various Monstrosities

name: In Your Face

volume.name: Sonic the Hedgehog In Your Face Special

description:
The two-tailed, high-flying wonder, Sonic's numero uno buddy Tails, gets his own three issue mini-series! You'll witness Tails striking out on his own in his Sea Fox submarine as he faces vicious robotic winged dingoes and the return of Octobot! You'll also thrill to the introduction of the Forty Fathom Freedom Fighters including Ray, Big Fluke, and P.B. Jellyfish! Tails will need all the help he can get as they all must battle the supremely terrifying Crocbot! Tails' solo adventures begin in Sonic Archives Vol. 7 with "Growing Pains" and continue in Sonic Archives Vol. 8. From there, it's straight into this number one!

Southerm Crossover!: Tails third solo task as he works to foil robotnik plans all by himself until octobot ambush. He was rescued by the Forty Fathoms Freedom Fighters

When two children sit down to play the latest Sonic game, little do they realise what's in store for them!

Also: Can the other residents of Knothole come to the rescue? Has Knuckles bitten off more than he can chew in his quest for the Royal Sword?
name: The Last Game Cartridge Hero

description:
1) Freedom Fighters and the Chaotix fight each other due to illusion done by Mammoth mogul so he can obtain the sword of acorns.

2) Antoine found half a map to an unknown treasure. As he seeks it in Robotropolis, so is Snively with the other half.
name: Sonic vs Knuckles Battle Royal

description: SONIC X starts off with a boom! When an evil plot by EGGMAN, with sidekicks DECOE and BOCOE putt hundreds in danger attempting to empty the bank vault of all its cash, DR. EGGMAN hopes to gain more bucks for bigger, badder Obots! Trapped in the bank are SONIC's friend Chris and his family! Only SONIC can save the day with help from KNUCKLES, AMY, CHEESE AND TAILS!
name: Savings and Groan
Sonic Firsts

description: This is the aftermath of endgame as the freedom fighters rebuild the city recover thier moral. This lead to other freed reveal of other free roboticized mobians, including Sonic’s parents who were thought dead.
name: Brave New World
Return of the King
Sonic Kids

description: Lobo and Jonas go undercover to 'Cheezworld,' a theme park threatened by a mad bomber. But little do they realize the horror of...the Bunny Suits?!
name: Welcome to Cheezworld

description: 'Toilet humor' gets a whole new meaning when Lobo and Jonas Glim ambush the Joe Pesni mob in a men's room. The frag shells really hits the fan in this tale of flying porcelain, exploding plumbing...and very weak bladders. Goldstar cameos.
name: Incident In A Men's Room

description: When Lobo's best 'hog' is shot out from under him, he has no choice but to hail a cab. But little does he realize the dangers within its alien, disease-infested passenger. Guest-starring the Space Cabby!
name: Return of the Space Cabby

description: Kari stole the master emerald so the knuckle and freedom fighters seek to get it back. a new villain that know of them from the future seeks to rule the multiverse.  In the freedom fighters travel they wonder to image universe. They allied with the image characters to stop the villain

name: A Different Lesson in Blood Unchanged!

volume.name: The Deadly Hands of Kung Fu

description: Because the fans demanded it, it's a special all-female furry issue! Here's where we separate the girls from the boys as an all- star creative lineup lends their talents to five all-new tales spotlighting the popular female cast members appearing in the Sonic and Knuckles series. "Ascension" showcases Princess Sally undergoing the rite to follow in her father's footsteps, while "Family" reveals the fate of Lupe and her kin. See Bunnie Rab-bot experience an "Upgrade," resulting in a major re-design, as Hershey goes "Solo" on a mission deep into enemy territory. Finally, the story all Julie-Su fans have been waiting for, as her past is finally revealed in the haunting tale "Shadows." Art by Jim Valentino, Patrick Spaziante, Colleen Doran, James Fry and Ken Penders.
name: Girls Rule!

description: Within the wet weather on Bwayne's World, Lobo has become a skeleton reanimated from last issue and sets to pick a bone against his accomplices as the Main Skeleton. Lobo's bountied target, Canis Galoopus, along with his bone-breaking pooches also set to put the bite on their mqnhunter, but Lobo hasn't lost his fighting spirit yet.
name: Wetterworld

description: In an effort to cure his drymouth ailment of a major hangover and several past adventures, Lobo gets some rest and relaxation to venture into space with a collection of space dolphins. In his effort to gain some peace of mind, Lobo is left giving a piece of his mind to annoying enviornmentalists, aggrevating tourists, and giving the flipper to a dolphin poacher before turning him into chum.
name: Bo On A Dolphin

description: It's a Genesis tie-in, Lobo style! Lobo handles Genesis with the same gut-wrenching aplomb he used with Zero Hour, Underworld Unleashed, and the rest of these damn cross-overs. Only this time, it's the end of the freakin' universe, and Lobo wasn't invited! So what does he do? He crashes the party! With booze, babes and brutality enough for everyone--including Darkseid--Lobo demands entertainment! He demands his money's worth! And not even that goody-goody super-cheez Goldstar can stop him! In fact, before this issue is over, Goldstar tries and fails to absorb all the goodness in the universe...and he pays for his failure with his life! It's hilarious, folks! And it's all here!
name: 3-Piece Suite

description: Just because the biggest organized brawl of the season is scheduled for that night, doesn't mean Lobo can say no to an offer of easy credits for a protection job that same evening. But when Paranoid Jones hires the Main Man to be his bodyguard, the last thing he expects is to be shackled to Lobo's side and dragged center stage for a massive, no-survivors blood-fest. And this time, Lobo plans on winning the fest single-handed, by facing off mano-a-mano against the likes of Big Bopper, Johnny Quietus, and the legend himself, Jackie Chin--the man with the largest chin in space.
name: The Big Brawl, Part One: The Trouble with Jackie Chin

description: Second half conclusion to 'The Big Brawl', Lobo continues his pay out fight against Jackie Chin along with Jonas Glim, Murder, Johnny Quietus and a few other brawlers. Al and Darlene contend against Lobo's bounty, Big Bopper, and Paranoid Jones gets gunned down. Also, Lobo loses his head- but not his spirit.
name: Pulp Friction

description: Because the fans demanded it, the special Sonic comic strip which began its run six months ago in Comic Shop News is now collected in its entirety. Those who have not been able to acquire the full run need not look any longer. Best of all, to satisfy the purists, it's printed in its original SIDEWAYS format! Also: "Giant Robotno!" (by Slott & Bollers, Fry & Robeiro, & Amash): Speaking of sideways, this story features the return of that zany sideways character, Zonic! Zonic needs help... so he calls upon none other than the Blue Blur himself, Sonic, to save millions in a neighboring zone where monsters rule. You'll never believe the end of this one!
name: Turnabout Heroes

description: The issue that few would anticipate: The Main Man is asked to put a hit against the Justice League. Imagine That.
name: Dead Heroes Don't

description: At last, the jealously guarded secret can be revealed! Where the heck does Lobo get that loyal entourage of para-military penguins that are always trooping through these pages? Were they really the hopeless, downtrodden slaves of the tyrant of the North, Kris "Crusher" Kringle? It's a bitter, frightful tale, full of guns, ice, some fish, some egg-hatching, and some brutal murdering sociopathic maniacs. ...
name: P-P-P-Penguin

description: It's a series of revoltin' eulogies for the dead super-cheez Goldstar, as Lobo disrupts the hell out of the ceremonies and does his level best to re-kill as many already-dead heroes as he can find. It's pretty sick, an' no mistake!
name: The Hunting Party, Pt.2

description: The Goldstar fan club uses Lobo's mashed-up corpse to power a gigantic galactic "GoodVibes" machine, beaming waves of Goldstar-inspired niceness to an unsuspecting cosmos. Unfortunately for the cosmos, Lobo's built-in badness overwhelms Goldstar's built-in goodness, and waves of evil corrupt all that lives!
name: The Hunting Party, Pt.3

description: Welcome to...Sheepworld? Cecil B. Geeky, what did you do on your summer vacation? Well, he went on a big family outing to Sheepworld, a fabulously charming place...until it turned into a giant bloodbath courtesy of Lobo, who showed up on the trail of some incredibly original and surprisingly distinctive fugitives. It's a heartwarming tale sure to permanently infuriate the ASPCA.
name: What I Did on my Holiday

description: A billion hearts are breaking--literally--with the news: the baddest bastich in the galaxy's gettin' married! Surely, this is one of the signs of the Apocalypse! Yer cordially invited to be there for Lobo's bone-breakin' bachelor party, vulgar vows, rip-roarin' reception, and the crashing consummation of the nastiest nuptials in history! And any feeb who starts cryin' at the wedding gets fragged! You wuz warned!
name: I Married a Main Man!

description: How's the Main Man gonna have his fun when he's stuck in a town that's hosting the Intergalactic Police Convention? How else? Strap on a gun and a badge and teach the boys in blue a lesson in dishin' out some truly criminal justice! Miss this one and Main Marshal ain't lettin' you off with just a warning!
name: The Curse of Tootn-Kamn!

description: Lobo co-creator Keith Giffen returns to illustrate a special tale that he and the regular guy, Alan Grant, cooked up. Seems a villain who treats world destruction as a fine art has decided to make Earth his next masterpiece, and Lobo's been hired to stop him. Will th' Main Man save a planet that gives him nothin' but grief? Or will he grab some popcorn, sit back, and watch the fireworks? We ain't sayin', but get the melted butter ready, just in case.
name: Ars Longa, Vita Fraggis!

description: Reptile King Drago hires Lobo to become the massacring murderer to a micro-universe race of beings placated onto his desk less he fears the race will venture out and war on his empire. Lobo is shrunk to microscopic levels from his world to become a giant battling tiny alien farmers onto another. Faster than you can say "Gulliver", the Main Man gets a lesson on size and battle.
name: Bad Wee Bastards

description: From Superman to the Demon, Lobo's faced some pretty tough foes before, but they don't hold a candle to his worst adversaries ever: the DC Comics Marketing and Editorial Departments!!! Yes, following a harsh review in Wizard, the "suits" in New York decide it's time to make over the Main Man. And it ain't pretty, when they turn the baddest biker in space into "Superbo"--the newest caped crusader for everything that's good and decent. How long do you think Lobo can stand being the goodest of the good guys before he goes postal on everyone in the comics business?
name: The All-New, Non-Violent Adventures of Super-Bo!, Part 1: The New Bo

description: In the second half of the censored reinventions of 'Super-Bo', Lobo and Alan Grant appear to break the 4th wall. Lobo allies with editor "Bad Dan" Raspler to battle the Savage Six to succumb to a blackmail plot to defile other DC heroes in lewd photos. Alan Grant relents to have Lobo surrender to the bad guys and loses his mind to revenge against his comic's critics- the comic review magazine commentators of Wizard Magazine.
name: The All-New, Non-Violent Adventures of Super-Bo!, Part 2: The Writer's Tale

description: The conclusion of 'Super-Bo' has the book's writer Alan Grant rampaging New York to put the lowdown beating of his life against Wizard Magazine editors for their critique on his own book. Lobo throws down his sorrows in beer and grudges with editor "Bad Dan" Raspler before the enemies from Wizard Magazine appear. Ultimately, Lobo lays down the law on who and what he is to no change of his attitude- and pummels Alan Grant on the side as well.
name: The All-New, Non-Violent Adventures of Super-Bo!, Part 3: Return to Eden
Soul Brothers, Part One: Heaven Sent ...Hell Bent!
Soul Brothers, Part Two: The Gospel According to Lobo

description: A million years into the future, Lobo has gotten old and fat in a universe where crime is scarce and discrimination is rare. Hiring the Main Man alone on blood work is a crime until a second chance, a billion dollar advance and a purposeful bounty put him to work and wreck havoc in a dimension of carnage he'd soon not escape.
name: Lobo's Last Job

description: The race is on to determine whether or not Velocity has what it takes to win the Pilot Season voting. Good issue but does it have what it takes to be #1? Cyberforce's resident speedster, Velocity, finally gets her groove on in this one-shot brought to you by Joe Casey (Uncanny X-Men, Avengers: Earth's Mightiest Heroes) and Kevin Maguire (Justice League, Superman/Batman)! How does a young heroine find love when she's the target of an all-new batch of super-villains?! Pure pop superheroics unlike anything Top Cow fans have ever experienced!

More info of the death of Jack"Nomad" Monroe. We see what has been happening in this man's mind and in his world, and it has not been a pleasant ride for Jack. Due to the drugs injected into him in the 1950's (when he was the second Bucky) Jack's immune system is rapidly degrading. He is told that the treatment for this will probably kill him before the symptoms do. Jack Monroe is dying. His mind is a twisted mess, due to this illness, and he sees what he believes is really happening. He thinks he is defeating enemies when he is defeating common civilians. He goes to a roadside bar...a dive really... and wallows in defeat and despair. When he goes outside to leave, he is confronted, slight words are exchanged, and.......we see just who the person is that shoots him. This issue brings together what transpired at the end of issue #3.

Notes:

  • Ranked #39 in Wizard Magazine's list of "100 Best Single Issue Comics Since You Were Born".
name: Interlude: The Lonesome Death of Jack Monroe

concept_credits.name: 100 Best Single Issue Comics Since You Were Born

first_appearance_concepts.name: 100 Best Single Issue Comics Since You Were Born

description: This is where it starts to gel together. A Russian sub finds Bucky's battered body, missing his left arm, and hauls this lifeless form aboard the sub. This is a flashback sequence obviously. Cap finds out that the Winter Soldier just may be his long thought dead wartime partner Bucky!
name: The Winter Soldier Part 1

description: Crossbones kidnaps the docile (brainwashed) daughter of the Red Skull, to begin the "un"brainwashing, and bring her back as Sin.Cap, Fury and the gang from S.H.I.E.L.D. raid the building where Lukin is presiding over a meeting.Due to political machinations, Fury orders the unit and Cap, to stand down. (against all their wishes)Cap is restless and getting angrier.
name: The Winter Soldier Part 2

description:
1. The Boy Who Saved Superman
  2. Shorty
  3. The Man Who Wanted To Die A Hero (Congo Bill)
  4. Start the Day Off Right! (Buzzy : a public service message for teens)
  5. The Hunters of the Future (Tommy Tomorrow)
  6. Jerry the Jitterbug
  7. Vigilante's Adopted Tribe
name: The Boy Who Saved Superman

description: What changes await Steve Rogers life now that the House of M is in control? In this new world order, watch the hero known as Captain America moves from the '40s to the present day, bearing witness to a changing landscape, watching as man becomes the minority, and mutant the ruler.
name: House of M

description: 1. The Adventure of Little Red (Superman) -- 2. When Congo Bill Fails (Congo Bill) -- 3. The Chase Through Space (Tommy Tomorrow) -- 4. Horse For A Day (Zatara) -- 5. Casey the Cop -- 6. The Cowboy From Broadway (Vigilante)
name: How Would You Like to Play Football With Superman? Read The Adventure of Little Red : New: Tommy Tomorrow

description: This is where we find out what really happened to Bucky after the drone plane exploded. Gripping stuff. Bucky has become the Winter Soldier, and is a pawn of the Russian Government. An assassin. Steve Rogers learns this as we do from a top secret file folder mysteriously left in his studio apartment. Steve has another WWII flashback then buries his head in his hands in grief. He knows.
name: The Winter Soldier, Part 3

description:
Superman's new powers provide a tempting target for the villain who craves an upgrade to his own malevolent might-Metallo! Although Superman has defeated him before, now he must beat Metallo with his new powers-the very thing that Metallo is using to boost his own abilities to the max!

Part 3 is in Action Comics #747

"1998 27"--Triangle in upper left hand corner.
name: Polyesteryear, Part 2: Love, Supervillain Style

description:
Superman: Arkham Part 3! The Science Police are after John Henry Irons for committing the heresy of thinking logically. Can the rusted-out Steel convince Superman that 2 + 2 doesn't equal "fish" before the deadliest hired gun ever, Bounty, gets the duo in his high-tech crosshairs? Continued in ACTION COMICS (1938) #769!

  1. No Axioms.

Story continued from: Adventures of Superman #582 Story continued in: Action Comics #769

Cover is a "flip" cover, like a face card, but with two different "faces"

"2000 36"--Superman "S" in upper left hand corner.
name: Superman Arkham Part 3: No Axioms

description:
Supergirl and Aquaman guest in a tumultuous issue! What crisis is too big for both Superman and Supergirl to handle? Learn the answer as a great storm threatens Metropolis, one that may be far more ominous than it seems.

  1. What He Didn't Do.

"2000 32"--Superman "S" in upper left hand corner.
name: What He Didn't Do

description:
Misa of the Outsiders returns, trapping the Man of Steel in a strange virtual nightmare while Project Cadmus attempts to restore Superman's powers.

Story continues in: Action Comics #729

"1997 2"--Triangle in upper left hand corner.
name: Race Against Time! : Power Struggle

description:
1. The Tower of Terror The Case of the Flying Castle -- 2. The Man Who Stole A Bank (Zatara) -- 3. Murder In Three Acts (Crimson Avenger) -- 4. Tactical Error -- 5. The Case of the Crime Clown (TNT and Dan the Dyna-Mite : story continues in Star Spangled Comics #7) -- 6. Wings For America (Red, White and Blue) -- 7. Gems of Jeopardy (Sandman) -- 8. Goggles -- 9. Vengeance (a story in text) -- 10. Rubies For Ransom (The King) -- 11. The Adventure of the Good-Hearted Gangster (Lando, Man of Magic) -- 12. Private Pete -- 13. Crime Takes A Holiday (Batman)

Cover: Superman, Batman and Robin are saluting (with planes in the background) on a movie screen.
name: Superman, Batman and Robin, Sandman, Zatara, Red, White & Blue : 96 Thrilling Pages!

description:
Naugus Games: Sonic was tricked by Ixis Naugus into bring out out of silent zone

Sonic Spin City: Sonic meets with someone to sabotage one of Robotnik's base
name: Naugus Games

description:
This issue features the much anticipated debut of the Downunda Freedom Fighters! Witness Tails battling those ferocious Wing Dingoes! Marvel at the non-stop villainy of Crocbot! Discover the secret identity of the mysterious mystic who comes to Tails' aid!

Souther Crossover Part 2: Tails travels to Downunda inorder foil Robotnik's plans when he was attacked. He was rescued by the Downunda Freedom Fighters.
name: Southern Crossover

description:
Sonic the Hedgehog's favorite fox, Tails, is hip deep in his own adventure -- along with a hip group of Freedom Fighters from Downunda! Can they stop Robotnik's new henchman, Crocbot?

Tails learns that Angel Island was connected to Downunda and joins the Downnda Freedom Fighters to defeat Crocbot

"Badd Eggnog": Tis the season for giving gifts and good will to all... or in Dr. Eggmans' case a perfect opportunity to crush the hopes and dreams of children everywhere, ruin Sonics' reputation, and steal gobs of the funny green stuff (money to you and I ) all in time for the winter holidays. How could Eggman do this? With the help of Santa Claus of course! With a kooky Christmas cover by Spaz!
name: Merry Eggs-Mas

description: This complete that was cut in issue# 50. It includes what happen to Antoine and Bunnie Rabbot.
name: Sonic 50 Director's Cut
Okay, My Cheeseroll, My Toys, My Comic Books, My Tapes and ... My Photo of Kitty Basinger!

volume.name: Tom and Jerry The Mouse From T.R.A.P.

description: 1. Droopy -- 2. Droopy -- 3. Wuff the Prairie Dog -- 4. Flip 'n' Dip -- 5. Tom & Jerry -- 6. Barney Bear and Benny Burro -- 7. Adventures Of Jerry (story in text) -- 8. Adventures Of Tom -- 9. Fuzzy & Wuzzy -- 10. Jerry & Tuffy

1. Droopy -- 2. Droopy -- 3. Wuff the Prairie Dog -- 4. Flip 'n' Dip -- 5. Tom & Jerry -- 6. Barney Bear & Benny Burro -- 7. Adventures Of Jerry (full text) -- 8. Adventures Of Tom -- 9. Fuzzy & Wuzzy -- 10. Jerry & Tuffy

1. Droopy -- 2. Droopy -- 3. Wuff the Prairie Dog -- 4. Flip 'n' Dip -- 5. Tom & Jerry -- 6. Barney Bear & Benny Burro -- 7. Adventures Of Jerry (full text) -- 8. Adventures Of Tom -- 9. Fuzzy & Wuzzy -- 10. Jerry & Tuffy

1. Droopy -- 2. Droopy -- 3. Wuff the Prairie Dog -- 4. Flip 'n' Dip -- 5. Tom & Jerry -- 6. Barney Bear & Benny Burro -- 7. Adventures Of Jerry (full text) -- 8. Adventures Of Tom -- 9. Fuzzy & Wuzzy -- 10. Jerry & Tuffy

1. Droopy -- 2. Droopy -- 3. Wuff the Prairie Dog -- 4. Flip 'n' Dip -- 5. Tom & Jerry -- 6. Barney Bear & Benny Burro -- 7. Adventures Of Jerry (full text) -- 8. Adventures Of Tom -- 9. Fuzzy & Wuzzy -- 10. Jerry & Tuffy

The fan-favorite Captain America team of Ed Brubaker and Steve Epting keep racing up the charts as Part Four of the trail-blazing WINTER SOLDIER arc hits hard! Cap now knows the truth about the Winter Soldier, and it’s far worse than he could have imagined. Now, lost in this torment, he faces a long dark night of the soul, while on the other side of the world, General Lukin’s plans for the Cosmic Cube finally come to light... But is he using the cube, or is the cube using him?

We open with Lukin holding a bidding war for the cosmic cube, which he ends up keeping, but uses it to coerce all present to sign over all of they're businesses in a merger. Steve talks with Fury about the top secret file he recieved mysteriously, and they both agree the cosmic cube was involved with this. More flashbacks, and we end with the Falcon finding Cap after Cap has gone out to run and vent, and they start talking.
name: The Winter Soldier, Part 4

description:
As “The Winter Soldier” arc rockets toward its senses-shattering conclusion, Cap’s allies come to his aid in the hunt for the man he believes may actually be his one-time partner. Featuring special guest appearances by both Iron Man and the Falcon! You can’t miss this issue, as red-hot creative team Brubaker and Epting up the ante one more time!

Cap and the Falcon are in Steve's apartment talking aboutthe cube, Lukin, and about Bucky.Steve realizes here that he is going to save Bucky from himself yet at the very same moment we see the Winter Soldier (Bucky) with Lukin. Lukin is dispatching Winter Soldier with the cosmic cube. (in a protective container)Where is he going?Meanwhile, Cap and the Falcon are joined by Iron Man in a raid on an A.I.M. wharehouse loaded with some high tech equipment. Battle suits reminiscant of the Mandroids are in this warehouse, and one is attacking our heroes as they subdue it.Cap and Falcon are next seen flying one of Tony Stark's jets to a remote fallout shelter where the cosmic cube is believed to have been taken to. When the get there, they are unknowingly now in the gunsight of............the Winter Soldier !!
name: The Winter Soldier, Part 5

description:
1. Wuff the Prairie Dog

  3. Tom & Jerry
  4. Our Gang
  5. Barney Bear & Benny Burro
  6. Pictopranks
  7. Tom & Jerry (full text)

'Unburying the Hatchet' What could be better than Dr. Eggman's killer robot, Metal Sonic? How about the real thing! What has turned Sonic against his friends in Knothole, and who among our heroes has to power to stop the true blue hero-gone-bad? SCRIPT: Ian Flynn ART: Tracy Yardley! (pencils) and Jim Amash (inks). Fiercely free cover by Spaz!
name: Unburying the Hatchet

volume.name: Sonic the Hedgehog Free Comic Book Day
